text: Rebecca Ryan (born 27 April 1991) is an English actress. She is best known for portraying the roles of Debbie Gallagher in the Channel 4 comedy-drama series Shameless (2004–2009), Vicki MacDonald in the BBC One school-based drama series Waterloo Road (2009–2011), and Gemma Dean in the BBC One medical drama series Casualty (2017–2019). From 2021 to 2022, she appeared as Lydia Chambers in the ITV soap opera Coronation Street. ==Other websites== * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:English child actors Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:Actors from Manchester
title: Rebecca Ryan
